SELECT fi.id, fi.user_id AS userId, fi.collect_user_id AS collectUserId, fi.create_date AS createDate, tu1.USERNAME AS username, tu1.AVATAR AS avatar, tu2.USERNAME AS collectUsername, tu2.AVATAR AS collectAvatar FROM focus_info fi LEFT JOIN t_user tu1 ON ( tu1.USER_ID = fi.user_id ) LEFT JOIN t_user tu2 ON ( tu2.USER_ID = fi.collect_user_id ) WHERE fi.delete_flag = 0
AND tu1.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{focusInfo.username},'%')
AND tu2.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{focusInfo.collectUsername},'%')
AND fi.user_id = #{focusInfo.userId}
ORDER BY fi.create_date DESC

SELECT fi.id, fi.user_id AS userId, fi.collect_user_id AS collectUserId, fi.create_date AS createDate, tu1.USERNAME AS username, tu1.AVATAR AS avatar, tu2.AVATAR AS collectAvatar, ui.name as collectUsername, ui.images as userImages, ui.content, ui.code FROM focus_info fi LEFT JOIN t_user tu1 ON ( tu1.USER_ID = fi.user_id ) LEFT JOIN t_user tu2 ON ( tu2.USER_ID = fi.collect_user_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON (ui.user_id = tu2.USER_ID) WHERE fi.delete_flag = 0 AND fi.user_id = #{userId}
